Concept

public struct Concept: JSONDecodable

Concept

A tagged concept extracted from a document. The concept may or may not have been explicitly mentioned. For example if an article mentions CERN and the Higgs boson, it will tag Large Hadron Collider as a concept even if the term is not mentioned explicitly in the page.

  • text

    detected concept tag

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let text: String?
  • relevance

    relevance score for a detected concept tag. Possible values: (0.0 - 1.0) [1.0 = most relevant]

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let relevance: Double?
  • knowledgeGraph

    The path through the knowledge graph to the appropriate keyword. Only returned when request parameter is provided: knowledgeGraph=1

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let knowledgeGraph: KnowledgeGraph?
  • website

    the website associated with this concept tag

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let website: String?
  • geo

    latitude longitude - the geographic coordinates associated with this concept tag

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let geo: String?
  • dbpedia

    sameAs link to DBpedia for this concept tag Note: Provided only for entities that exist in this linked data-set
